title: The Ultimate National Pokédex: Pokémon Diamond Version & Pearl Version
description: TRAIN WITHOUT PAIN! Every Pokémon, every move, and every secret - the Ultimate National Pokédex has everything you need to become the ultimate Trainer! Tips for catching the toughest and rarest Pokémon in Sinnoh! Complete Pokédex information for all known Pokémon! Comprehensive lists of moves, items, and abilities! Over 300 pages in length and a bonus poster included! The Ultimate National Pokédex features every Pokémon from every game, including Pokémon Diamond Version and Pokémon Pearl Version for Nintendo DS!
author: Nintendo Power
